analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
āsava sampayutta duka sa nidassana ttika

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe

original: (Naāsavasampayuttanaanidassanasappaṭighamūle tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsava sampayutta na anidassana sa paṭigha mūle tīṇi yeva hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka
